about_the_game:
Oh yeah! Follow Kazuki, he'll be free! Trust in me and we will escape from virginity!

Our protagonist, Kazuki, has moved to the city to break out of his shell and graduate from being a timid bachelor and get it on with some hot ladies in the big city! Not that he’s ever had a girlfriend before…

In his big city debut, Kazuki is immediately smitten by his gorgeous neighbor, Haruka. She has the allure of an older woman; perfect for an inexperienced guy! She even has a rocking body straight out of an eroge or something! Sounds perfect right? A hot, mature lady who lives next door, and she’s kind? But there’s always a catch: she's married...

But that doesn’t stop… her?!. After our guy Kaz fumbles his way through his first chance encounter with Haruka, fortune strikes at the perfect moment: she dropped her wallet! That evening, he works up the courage to return it to her and what happens next really blows him... away! A totally different Haruka answers the door, one with no bra, and a totally different aura. Before he can even question what's happening, Haruka is on her knees dick-in-mouth letting him know she loves the ravenous stares he shoots her way, she has been teasing him this whole time waiting for him to pounce on her!

It's a modern spin on a Hentai classic, this time the man next door IS the Hentai Homewrecker?!

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • Haruka is fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with animated character sprites
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • Comprehensive H-Scene documentation of the journey from bachelor to BEEFCAKE!

Hentai Homewrecker is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.
- Characters engage in BDSM play, elements including; domination.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Hentai Homewrecker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

short_description: Ready to make your debut as a hot available bachelor after moving to the big city, are you ready to go from inexperienced virgin to the stud for the horniest housewife in town?!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain
